item.title: server_offset
item.description: Time difference from your time and server time (In seconds)

item.title: closeMod
item.description: Module that runs after all steamEngine code has run

item.title: initMod
item.description: Module that before after all steamEngine code has run

item.title: site_off_msg
item.description: Message to show when the site is turned off.

item.title: files_default_dir
item.description: Prepopulated path in the files page

item.title: files_permission
item.description: Permission level for the files page

item.title: logo
item.description: Logo that will appear above the pages list. (Leave blank for none)

item.title: base_href
item.description: Path from the domain root to the site root (used for sites developed in dev directories)

item.title: admin_level
item.description: Permission value for the pages and fields pages

item.title: users_table
item.description: Table to be used for steamEngine Users. Be careful when changing this.

item.title: welcome_msg
item.description: Welcome message displayed when logging in to steamEngine

item.title: ftp_base_href
item.description: Path from the FTP users home to the domain root
